about_the_game:
This is the prologue to Dune Mechanic : Survive The Steampunk Era . Which Include a 3-5 hours of gameplay. You can try some basic mechanics of the game like building factories, gathering resources, fighting robots, researching skills, traiding, managing. In full version of the game will be able much more content. Like this :



You will have to survive in the harsh world of the steampunk era, with a constant shortage of resources. Explore new lands, look for caves with minerals, explore the ruins for food and water. Build factories by modules, creating and assembling each piece. Explore new technologies, and develop new engines. Exlore various fuel technologies. Protect your camp from the invasion of mechanical robots that are constantly eager to dismantle your factories for parts. Research and improve your technologies and factories.

Create weapons of your dreams from gunpowder pistols to grenade launchers. Craft cartridges manually by mixing powder ingredients in different proportions. Melt ore, blow glass, study chemistry, and make explosives. Cut wood, mine ore, dig, shoot, build and repair, create drones to transport resources, build transport systems and more.



Powder pistols, revolvers, Winchesters, shotguns, sniper rifles, machine guns, Gatling guns, grenade launchers, and more.
Want a weapon with 2 barrels - please, 3…5 or even 10 barrels, it depends on your imagination.



Make barrels of different diameters and cast bullets of different calibers.
Collect various factories from hundreds of different spare parts.



Fill your engines with the fuel and use the oil grease so that they don't rust or break down.
Repair damaged engines and restore factories replacing broken parts.



  • Improve your character by raising his skill level.
  • Develop an exoskeleton and upgrade it to carry heavy parts in your inventory.
  • Build and manage a complete chemical laboratory, mix, heat, cool reagents for different effects.
  • Cut, mine, dig, shoot, build, research, design, craft, explore and more!

In this game, everything you will see, all the tools, factories, engines, every gear, all this will be created and assembled by your hands from scratch.

You can try some basic mechanics of the game like building factories, gathering resources, fighting robots, researching skills, traiding, managing. In full version of the game will be able much more content. Like this :

movies.name: Dune Mechanic : Survive The Steampunk Era

name: Dune Mechanic : Survive The Steampunk Era Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video card memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Create weapons of your dreams from gunpowder pistols to grenade launchers. Craft cartridges by mixing powder ingredients. Melt ore, blow glass, study chemistry, and make explosives. Cut, mine, dig, shoot, build, research, design, craft, explore and more in the Dune deserts!
